markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Star Chart Tattoo](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1484)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 107</row>

**Price** 900 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattooed on the body

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This tattoo consists of numerous asterisks at regular intervals along the fingers of one hand, perfect for measuring stars against the horizon. When used against a clear night sky, the tattoo grants a +2 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) and counts as a [compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16) for the purpose of that action.

<document level="2" id="action-1121" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Star Chart Tattoo
